nodes.bodyText:
I would use more modern target_include_directories - this would lead to less clutter if someone decides to do add_subdirectory on a directory containing this file - it would propagate and everything declared after would have these directories.
If projects linking to ${PROJECT_NAME} require to know these headers then do target_include_directories(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC ...), if not then change PUBLIC with PRIVATE
